content: Loved this — right up to the point where you offered me another book! But I agree about learning, specially from the people around you. Although as my granddad said, “you can learn something from anyone — even if it’s only how to suffer fools gladly”. And something my granny said to me (when she was 81) “One day I’ll decide what I want to do when I grow up”. I’m 61 and still agreeing with her.
